title: Rank Badge, 18th century
medium:
Medium: satin, silk and metal thread
Technique: embroidery
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson
description: Mandarin square (P'u tzu) for civil official of the seventh rank. Embroidery in Pekin stitch and couching showes a mandarin duck surrounded by cloud and water forms and by symbols. Colored silk embroidery on black satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Rank Badge, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: satin, silk and metal thread
Technique: embroidery. Gift of the Estate of Mrs. Robert H. Patterson. 1941-31-52.
